description:
### 11.12 bitplanenoise

Show and measure bit plane noise.


The filter accepts the following options:


- **`bitplane`**
  - Set which plane to analyze. Default is
1
.
- **`filter`**
  - Filter out noisy pixels from
bitplane
set above.
Default is disabled.
Set which plane to analyze. Default is 1.


Filter out noisy pixels from bitplane set above.
Default is disabled.
name: bitplanenoise

options.description: Set which plane to analyze. Default is 1.
options.name: bitplane

options.description: Filter out noisy pixels from bitplane set above. Default is disabled.
options.name: filter
